components.name: Application Gateway
components.description: Acts as a load balancer and provides routing and security features for incoming traffic.

components.name: Web App
components.description: The core application hosted on Azure that processes user requests and interacts with the database.

components.name: Azure SQL Database
components.description: A managed database service for storing application data securely.

components.name: Web App Firewall
components.description: Protects the web application from common threats and vulnerabilities.

components.name: Azure Active Directory
components.description: Manages user identities and access to the web application.

data_flows.description: Users initiate a DNS lookup that resolves to the Application Gateway, which routes traffic to the Web App.
The Web App interacts with the Azure SQL Database to retrieve and store application data.
Incoming traffic is filtered through the Web App Firewall for security checks before reaching the Web App.

trust_boundaries.name: User Interaction Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between end-users and the application infrastructure.

trust_boundaries.name: Data Storage Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary protecting the database and sensitive data.
